text: Uma Karuna Thurman (born April 29, 1970 in Boston, Massachusetts) is an American movie actress. She is famous for her role in many movies. These include Quentin Tarantino's Pulp Fiction and Kill Bill Volume 1 and 2. ==Family== Thurman's mother, Nena von Schlebr√ºgge, is a psychiatrist and former model. Her father, Robert Thurman, was a Professor of Buddhism. Her father is of German, English, Irish and Scottish descent. Her mother is of Swedish, Danish and German descent. Before her parents' marriage, her mother was married to Timothy Leary. One of her three brothers is Ganden Thurman, a Hollywood yoga guide. Uma Thurman has three children. She has a daughter, actress Maya, and son from her second husband, Ethan Hawke and a daughter from her partner, Swiss businessperson Arpad Busson. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Boston Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Uma Thurman
